headline: Jim Cramer Calls Carpenter Technology One of His Favorites
summary: Carpenter Technology Corporation (NYSE:CRS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer expressed his thoughts on. During the lightning round, when a caller asked about the stock, Cramer remarked: “No, it’s too late. It’s one of my favorites. It’s a great steel company. It’s moved up, moved up, moved up, moved up. Go buy Nucor, hasn’t […]
